description.detailed_html: Merges another patch into the current patch. After the merge (patch.merge(next)), patch.apply(value) is equivalent to next.apply(patch.apply(value)).

declaration_raw:
template <
  typename Patch,
  typename Derived
> class BasePatch;

description.detailed_html:
Base class for all patch types.

  • Patch: The Thrift struct representation for the patch.

  • Derived: The leaf type deriving from this class.

definition.detailed_html: BasePatch(const BasePatch&) = default
